docs.title: Welcome
docs.text: Hi, I'm a 17-year-old French developer who loves games and makes games. I started programming when I was 11 years old. My first game and project was on Scratch, but I quickly switched to Python and C# for my projects in general, and to GDScript with Godot Engine for my games. I already have a very solid foundation in Python and have started transitioning from GDScript to C#.

docs.title: Hello
docs.text: it's me, the friend who post occasionally

docs.title: Hello world
docs.text:
This is the first post of this site !

I will use this site to post about my projects, add documentation for some future projects and present my projects.

My friends MathChameleon will occasionally post.
